welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pongnam, a charming city known for its beautiful natural scenery and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful destination has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suwon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Suwon Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Osan AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Osan AB Airport, primarily used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gimpo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Gimpo Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network by selecting 'Gimpo Airport Free WiFi' and completing a short registration process.
